data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Date/time blackout periods". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Read reporting endpoints and verify booking totals, counts, and statuses align with saga actions.
data.expectedResult: Reported metrics match booking actions and highlight any discrepancies for schema/API iteration.

data.instruction: Create a primary location for the biz and set timezone aligned with scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Location exists and is associated with the new biz.

data.instruction: Create a primary location for the biz and set timezone aligned with scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Location exists and is associated with the new biz.

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Production access requires approval + pairing". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Configure pricing defaults for the offer lifecycle including call fees/manual surge if UC needs imply it.
data.expectedResult: Pricing model persists and future bookings can calculate totals deterministically.
